caption: A group of people sits in the yard, chatting and smoking. Two individuals converse on a sofa indoors. Another group is having a party on the grass. Meanwhile, in the study, the conversation continues. The scene transitions to a bus, where a man in sunglasses is present. At the back of the bus, a few people initiate a conversation. The scene shifts to an airport, where someone is on the phone. The person on the other end of the call is driving. Finally, a man and a woman appear in a hotel room.

global.question: When does it happen in the video, ancient age, modern age or future?

breakpoint.question: Is the person a man or a woman?
